summary: DAPP - The more $COW tokens you hold in your wallet, the more Benefits you will get. MilkCow Protocol is a community driven project with the vision of creating a positive impact in people’s lives by being a trusted and long term investment. MilkCow Token is the first feature of the protocol, which is a fairly launched, low supply and highly deflationary DeFi Token. Simply hodl $COW tokens in your wallet and you will get more. Earning crypto was never this simple. Every transaction automatically contributes to liquidity, ensuring our members can always sell their MilkCow whenever they please. By holding MilkCow in your wallet you will receive your cut of 1% on every transaction. Passive income earned while you sleep. CONTRACT ADDRESS: 0xeEBEc66614D4B5543532e9C88408Cb670D746fb9 $COW are best purchased and sold through UniSwap. $COW is a decentralized experiment and, as such, we always incentivize the use of DEXs. Due to MilkCow Tokenomics, remember to set slippage tolerance over 1% so your transaction can go through. Contract Address:0xeEBEc66614D4B5543532e9C88408Cb670D746fb9 MilkCow Staking DApp is another way to earn passive income (in $COW ) within the MilkCow Protocol Ecosystem. You can get high APRs by adding liquidity and you can also do single token staking with $COW, and other Partner’s tokens. The goal for this feature is to incentivize long term holding and liquidity provision by the community, so liquidity can also be decentralized and always rewarded.
